Package org.steveleach.scoresheet.ui

Android user interface for the Ice Hockey scoresheet app, including the main ScoresheetActivity.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DefaultFragmentActivity
    Interface for activities that have a default fragment to show.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AndroidSystemContext
    Abstraction for system context, Android implementation.
    GameFragment
    UI fragment for editing game details.
    GoalFragment
    Implementation code for the new Goal UI fragment.
    HelpFragment
    Implementation code for the new Help UI fragment.
    HistoryFragment
    Implementation code for the new Game History UI fragment.
    PenaltyFragment
    Implementation code for the new Penalty UI fragment.
    PlayersFragment
    Fragment code for teamName Players editor.
    PlayerTableRow
    A row in the Players table.
    ReportFragment
    Implementation code for the Game Report UI fragment.
    SavesFragment
    Implementation code for the List Saved Games UI fragment.
    ScoresheetActivity
    Main Activity for the Scoresheet app.
    ScoresheetFocusChangeListener
    Add to a text field to show an error if the content is shorter than a specified value.
    ScoresheetFragment
    Abstract base class for Fragments in the Scoresheet app.

Package org.steveleach.scoresheet.ui Description

Android user interface for the Ice Hockey scoresheet app, including the main ScoresheetActivity.

The Activity and Fragment classes live here.

Author:
Steve Leach
